articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blames U.S. for Posing Nuclear Threat to DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blames U.S. for Posing Nuclear Threat to DPRK
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry spokesman gave a statement on Wednesday in connection with the fact that the U.S. is pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula, which entered the phase of detente, back to the state of tensions and confrontation.
					The statement said that the ever-mounting nuclear threat and blackmail by the U.S. and its moves for making preparations for a war of aggression are a serious encroachment upon the sovereignty and right to existence of the DPRK, and a wanton violation of the DPRK-U.S. agreements and September 19 joint statement in which Washington gave "assurances" not to use force against the DPRK including nuclear weapons nor pose any threats to it with those forces. 
					
					It went on:
					
					This notwithstanding, the U.S. is trying to make the public convince that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is precisely the DPRK's dismantlement of nuclear program, while making sophism that the restart of the nuclear facilities in Nyongbyon are a violation of international obligation and commitments, if it is true. This is aimed to cover up its crimes and shift the responsibility on to the DPRK.
					
					The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, the invariable aim of the policy of the DPRK government, does not mean the unilateral nuclear dismantlement on the part of the DPRK side. This is the process of making the peninsula a nuclear-free zone on the basis of completely removing the substantial nuclear threats posed to the peninsula from outside on the principle of simultaneous actions.
					
					Action for action remains a basic principle for finding a solution to the nuclear issue on the peninsula and the DPRK will, therefore, not unilaterally move first. 
					
					At present there exist only physical moves on the peninsula where there are neither peace nor stability nor dialogue. This is attributable to the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and sanctions against the DPRK. 
					
					Increasing nuclear threat from outside will only compel the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent to cope with this. It will not be bound to anything in doing so.
					
					The DPRK stands for peace and stability and demands the U.S. roll back its hostile policy towards the former but will never beg the latter to do so. 
					
					The DPRK will dynamically advance towards a final victory, invariably keeping to the road of independence, Songun and socialism no matter how Washington behaves.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Peru Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Peru Appointed
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Hak Chol was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Peru, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of French Business Circles Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegation of French Business Circles Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of French business circles led by Alban Yung, Chinese representative of "Foundation of Victor Segalen", Wednesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					They paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in humble reverence.
					
					They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them. 
					
					They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.
					
					The head of the delegation made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Japanese Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the New Socialist Party of Japan headed by Eiko Tomiyama, vice-president of its Central Executive Committee, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					Being briefed on the undying revolutionary history of the President and his family in Mangyongdae, the guests went round historic mementoes.
					
					At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said:
					
					Kim Il Sung was born in a house with straw-thatched roof with low angle rafter and nurtured a big intention to liberate the country.
					
					He wisely led the Korean people to achieving the cause of national liberation.
					
					He is a great leader of the people.
					
					The guests also visited the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					The head of the delegation wrote in the visitor's book:
					
					Women receive free medical treatment. This is a reality that can be seen only in the socialist system of the DPRK. The visit helped me keenly feel the warm love of Marshal Kim Jong Un for the people.
					
					The delegation also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Kyongsang Kindergarten and other places.

articles.title: Sojourn of Delegation of French Business Circles Here
articles.content:
Sojourn of Delegation of French Business Circles Here
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of French business circles led by Alban Yung, Chinese representative of "Foundation of Victor Segalen", visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum. 
					The guests paid high tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung acknowledging the cheers of masses at the square where a military parade was held to celebrate the victory in the war.
					
					They paid tribute to the officers and men of the heroic Korean People's Army before sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					They went round various halls, being briefed on the undying leadership feats Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, performed in winning a brilliant victory in the war and the feats the army and people of the DPRK displayed in honorably defending the dignity of the country.
					
					The delegation also went to the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute, the Munsu Water Park and other places. And it enjoyed a performance given by artistes of the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre.

articles.title: Indonesian FM Leaves
articles.content:
Indonesian FM Leaves
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Indonesian Foreign Minister Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa and his party left here for home on Wednesday.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition on Czech Culture Opens Here
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition on Czech Culture Opens Here
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- There opened a photo exhibition "Cultural Relics of the Czech Republic" at the Pyongyang Centre for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries on Wednesday to mark the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the Czech Republic and the national day of the latter.
					Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned, working people and students in the city, Dusan Strauch, Czech ambassador to the DPRK, and officials of his embassy.
					
					Foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of their embassies here were present on invitation.
					
					Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					Then the participants looked round the photos showing the history and culture of the Czech Republic.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in Cuba to Mark DPRK's Anniversary
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in Cuba to Mark DPRK's Anniversary
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- A new stamp was issued in Cuba to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					The stamp depicts the Chollima Statue, the flag of the DPRK and the magnolia blossom against the background of the panorama of Pyongyang with the Tower of the Juche Idea in the center. Written in the stamp are letters reading "65th Anniversary of the DPRK" and "Cuba 2013".
					
					A stamp-issuing ceremony was held in Havana on October 16.
					
					Present at the ceremony were officials of the party, government and organizations of Cuba and masses and the general secretary of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America.
					
					On hand there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and members of his embassy.
					
					After the ceremony, the participants watched a performance given by Cuban artistes.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials did friendship labor at the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Co-op Farm in Chollima District, Nampho City Wednesday. They helped farmers in threshing rice.
					During break, they watched an art performance given by kindergartners and talked to farmers.
					
					The ambassador hoped that the farmers would register success in agricultural production this year, true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					The embassy officials handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: DPRK Player Wins Gold Medal at 2013 World Weightlifting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Player Wins Gold Medal at 2013 World Weightlifting Championship
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful at the 2013 World Weightlifting Championships now under way in Poland.
					Kim Un Guk bagged gold medal by lifting 150 kg in the snatch event in the men's 62-kilogram category on Tuesday.
					
					He won silver medal with a total of 320kg by lifting 170 kg in the clean and jerk event.

articles.title: New Mushroom Research Institute Inaugurated
articles.content:
New Mushroom Research Institute Inaugurated
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The National Mushroom Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences was successfully built in Pyongyang as a modern research base which we can stand proud in the eyes of the world with the wealth for the people increasing day by day.
					With the total floor space of more than 6 100 square meters the institute has all necessary conditions for research and solid groundwork for putting the production of mushroom on an industrial and scientific basis and producing more delicious mushroom  of high nutritious value.
					
					To put the production of mushroom on an industrial and scientific basis is a plan unfolded by the Workers' Party of Korea for improving the diet of the Korean people.
					
					Marshal Kim Jong Un let the People's Army take charge of the construction and took necessary measures. He also made sure that the institute is equipped with the latest experimental equipments.
					
					The institute was built in less than three months thanks to the devoted efforts made by the soldier-builders.
					
					Not only different research rooms, labs and mushroom growing grounds but offices, walkways linking the main building with auxiliary one, vestibule, resting place, etc. have been built in such a way as to be impeccable.
					
					The dust free institute has introduced the heating system with the use of geotherm and has been equipped with the latest scientific research facilities and all the conditions for successfully conducting the researches for cultivation of the mushroom.
					
					A room for preserving spore of different species of mushroom, cultivation research room, a substrate research room, a scientific and experimental laboratory, a growth and species verification room and other laboratories show the high level of the institute.
					
					At the intermediary plant for the production of the fungus and substrate and mushroom cultivation rooms providing conditions necessary for mushroom cultivation by automatically adjusting the temperature, humidity, content of carbon dioxide and light in cultivation greenhouses, researchers can confirm the practical data for putting the production of mushroom on an industrial and scientific basis.
					
					Spores of mushroom whose species have been researched and fixed are being supplied to all mushroom cultivation bases across the country according to their seasonal and regional characters and they can contribute to raising the wind of mushroom production.
					
					The institute has an e-library, a room for scientific and technological seminar, reading room, scientific information room and a room for distributing new technology.

articles.title: Munsu Water Park in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Munsu Water Park in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Munsu Water Park, a health complex for citizens, has splendidly sprung up on the picturesque bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang.
					The Water Park, covering an area of 109,000 square meters, consists of indoor and outdoor wading pools, gymnasium and others.
					
					Erected in the lobby of its indoor wading pool is the colored gypsum statue of leader Kim Jong Il, who devoted all his life to the people's welfare.
					
					The two-storied indoor wading pool with two roofs of pyramid-shape has 15 water tanks for swimming, surfing, brine, supersonic waves, etc., octopus- and mushroom-shaped douche places and various types of water slides, which help visitors relieve fatigue.
					
					It also houses tens of recessing places in the tunnel, whose ceiling and walls are shaped as running waves, with dim lightings installed below walls.
					
					And there are nine kinds of saunas such as oak charcoal sauna, salt sauna and ochre saunas, which are very effective in improving human health and enhancing skin resilience.
					
					Besides, it is arranged with soft drink stands and restaurants, which serve dishes and beverages made by cooks from Haedanghwa Service Complex, Haemaji Restaurant and other noted catering service establishments in the capital city of Pyongyang, as well as with shops for swimming and athletic apparatuses.
					
					The outdoor wading pool has various types of water slides and 10-odd water tanks, including seawater tank and water tank extending several hundred meters.
					
					It is also furnished with a small water park for children, beach volleyball court, diving tower and artificial falls and rocky mountain with a cave reminding one of Mts. Myohyang and Kumgang, where sculptures of various animals are standing.
					
					The gymnasium with a roof of pyramid-shape has two stories. On the ground floor there are courts for volleyball, basketball and badminton games and trampoline and rock-climbing facilities and, on the first floor, bowling alley and fitness room.
					
					The Munsu Water Park is now busy with an increasing number of visitors every day.

articles.title: Stories about Kim Jong Un's Loving Care for Future
articles.content:
Stories about Kim Jong Un's Loving Care for Future
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Okryu Children's Hospital has been built as one of the monumental edifices in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					The hospital looks like a palace for the children.
					
					It has a lot of stories about the warm love shown by supreme leader Kim Jong Un for posterity. Following are some of them:
					
					- Heliport
					
					When the construction of the hospital was at height its soldier-builders got surprised to hear that a project for heliport was added to its design.
					
					Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un took this step in anticipation of emergency patients from distance.
					
					After all, a heliport was created at the hospital, touching the hearts of builders and citizens.
					
					- "Exhibition of Juvenile Films"
					
					All walls from the first floor to the sixth floor of the hospital are decorated with more than 1 700 scenes from Korean children's films and collections of world's famous tales for children.
					
					Those pictures on the walls were drawn by professional artists and teachers and students of Pyongyang University of Fine Arts, in response to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un.
					
					People call them "Exhibition of Juvenile Films".
					
					- Enigma
					
					A foreign expert came to the hospital when its medical equipment and apparatuses were being assembled.
					
					Seeing expensive facilities of the hospital, he asked a DPRK guide whom it is for, adding it is hard to believe that they are needed for the treatment of children.
					
					Though he was told that children of ordinary working masses in the DPRK would get medical service at the hospital without payment, he still remained skeptical about the fact, stressing that he had never seen such practice in any country.
					
					So, the expert decided to visit the hospital later to get an answer for his enigma.

articles.title: Results of DPRK Championships in Some Events
articles.content:
Results of DPRK Championships in Some Events
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Competitions for the DPRK Championships came to a close in some events, which started in early October.
					The April 25 Sports Team made good results in the swimming and diving.
					
					The Kigwancha Sports Team placed first in the total standings of track-and-field events, by winning gold medals in men's 200 m and 400 m races and 4×100 m and 4×400 m relays, women's 200 m and 800 m races and 4×100 m and 4×400 m relays, men's and women's long and triple jumps, shot-put and discus throw and other categories.
					
					The April 25 Defense Sports Team took the men's and women's archery titles.
					
					The Ministry of Commerce Sports Team came first in the acrobatic gymnastics, while the Taeryonggang Sports Team second and the Ryesonggang Sports Team third.
					
					The first place in the baseball event was taken by the Kigwancha Sports Team and the second and the third by the Taeryonggang Sports Team and the Waudo Sports Team respectively.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Regime for Giving Wide Publicity to Success of Park's Foreign Trip
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Regime for Giving Wide Publicity to Success of Park's Foreign Trip
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea is busy taking follow-up measures after Park's foreign trip.
					It is giving publicity to "initiative for peace and cooperation" and "groundwork laid for security dialogue" and is trumpeting that she "elicited support of East Asian countries for confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula and initiative for peace in Northeast Asia".
					
					It is absurd and foolish publicity given by political peddlers.
					
					If they had an elementary sense as a politician, they might not have handled things in a reversed way.
					
					Park made several foreign trips including the recent one in the capacity of the south Korean "president". But all she has done before the nation and history are an act of treachery of begging outsiders for international cooperation against fellow countrymen.
					
					No wonder, during her maiden visit to the U.S. as "president" she slandered the DPRK's line on simultaneously pushing ahead with economic construction and the building of the nuclear force and talked such rubbish as "peace and unification based on the principle of free market economy" only to face such public criticism that "she was keen on standing in contrast to the north at the crossroads of war or peace".
					
					Clear is the reason why the Park regime staged the farce of highlighting the success of her foreign trip.
					
					Dependence on outsiders is a deep-seated mode of existence which she inherited from her father.
					
					The regime vitiated the hard-won atmosphere of reconciliation on the Korean Peninsula and created serious confrontational circumstances again. But it is intensifying confrontation with fellow countrymen in alignment with foreign forces, far from making an apology before the nation.
					
					It is keen on tightening sanctions and encircling ring around the DPRK in a bid to realize their ambition for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					It confirmed the "tailored deterrence strategy", a scenario for a preemptive nuclear attack on the north, together with the U.S. and staged dangerous naval joint military exercises in the East, South and West Seas of Korea in succession with a U.S. nuclear carrier involved.
					
					One can easily judge that the reckless act to isolate and stifle the fellow countrymen in reliance on outsiders will entail a serious consequence in the light of the geo-political features of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					It is a historical lesson that dependence on foreign forces will escalate distrust and confrontation between fellow countrymen and cause a serious hurdle in the way of dialogue and cooperation.
					
					It is highly ridiculous that the regime is trumpeting about "the initiative for peace in Northeast Asia" even though it caused serious situation of destroying peace and stability in the region by fanning up confrontation with fellow countrymen through cooperation with foreign forces.
					
					The puppet regime which stakes its fate in dependence on foreign forces should understand that its racket for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen will bring shame and political ruin to it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Snubs S. Korean Regime's Watchword "Confidence-Building Process"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Snubs S. Korean Regime's Watchword "Confidence-Building Process"
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The north-south relations have been put on the orbit of confrontation and the escalated tension again  and the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that a nuclear war may break out any moment. The present south Korean ruling forces are wholly to blame for this alarming development as they are getting frantic with the moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in collaboration with outsiders after adopting what they called "confidence-building process" as their "policy towards the north."
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in an article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The "confidence-building process" on the lips of the south Korean authorities represents a policy for confrontation and war  with the DPRK from A to Z as it is aimed at blocking the mending of the inter-Korean ties and increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula.
					
					Keeping mum about the U.S. nuclear threat, the south Korean puppet ruling forces described the DPRK's nuclear deterrence as a "threat" and adopted their scenario for pressurizing "the north to dismantle its nukes" as a main mainstay of their "policy towards the north."
					
					This is the main hurdle lying in the way of repairing the inter-Korean relations as it is a clear expression of their hostility towards compatriots and their scenario to invade the north.
					
					"Changes in the north" which the puppet regime is seeking through the "confidence-building process" are designed to lead the north "to reforms and opening". Its ultimate goal is to bring down the dignified socialist system in the north and achieve "the unification of the social systems" in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					In recent days, the war-like forces are keen on establishing the "Kill Chain," a system for mounting a preemptive attack, and the "missile defense system" in the wake of their formal working out of the "tailored deference strategy" with the U.S.
					
					In another development, the warmongers openly staged the DPRK-targeted nuclear strike maneuvers with U.S. nuclear strategic bombers and nuclear-powered carrier involved in them.
					
					This clearly proves that the "confidence-building process" will bring nothing but the escalated military confrontation and tension between the north and the south and the danger of a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					The said watchword represents the confrontation policy of the pro-U.S. elements zealously following the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK. This is an aspect revealing the regime's treacherous and anti-reunification nature.
					
					All the moves pursued by the regime for putting its watchword into practice are geared to tightening the "alliance" with the U.S. and boosting cooperation in increasing the military pressure on the DPRK for the purpose of escalating the confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					The inter-Korean ties can never be a plaything for realizing the watchword of the warmongers.
					
					The present catastrophic inter-Korean relations are evil consequences of their watchword and, at the same time, clear evidence proving its failure.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Properly Understand DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Properly Understand DPRK
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. authorities are letting loose rhetoric in a bid to create impression that they are concerned for the improvement of the DPRK-U.S. relations, but this sounds too hoary and disgusting to hear.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a commentary.
					
					If the U.S. is truly concerned for the improved DPRK-U.S. relations, it should make a bold decision to withdraw its aggressor forces from south Korea without delay, it notes, and goes on:
					
					The U.S. warmongers opened to public even a strategy for preemptive nuclear attack after staging ceaseless maneuvers for a nuclear war by introducing nuclear carriers in the wake of the involvement of strategic nuclear capable bombers. It is needless to say the proposal for concluding a non-aggression treaty touted by them is nothing but a poor farce.
					
					The aim sought by the U.S. in deliberately escalating the tension quite contrary to the  patient efforts of the DPRK, a nuclear weapons state, for peace is to bar it from achieving economic prosperity and justify its arms buildup aimed to maintain a military edge in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					This is the reason why the U.S. is persisting in military provocations, desperately defying the DPRK's just call for ensuring peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula through dialogue and negotiations without any precondition. 
					
					It is the height of shameless and crafty nature of the U.S. to urge the DPRK to drop its arms first and propose it to conclude the non-aggression treaty. 
					
					The Korean people have keenly realized through life experience that the U.S. proposal for concluding the above-said treaty cannot protect peace and security on the peninsula but the DPRK's self-defensive revolutionary armed forces possessed of nukes can protect and guarantee everything.
					
					If the U.S. truly wants to improve its relations with the DPRK, it should properly understand the latter and take a right stance.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Group Accused of Concealing Illegal Acts
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Group Accused of Concealing Illegal Acts
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea disturbed the investigation and put pressure in a bid to conceal the puppet Intelligence Service's (IS) illegal acts, according to south Korean KBS on Oct. 21.
					Yun Sok Yol, chief of the Ryoju branch office of the Suwon District Prosecutor's Office, who headed the special team for investigating the case of the IS's involvement in the election, testified to this fact.
					
					Yun who was present as a witness at the inspection of state administration at the meeting of the Legislative and Judiciary Committee of the "National Assembly" testified to the fact that he met Jo Yong Gon, chief of the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office, on Oct. 15 and told him about the operation to arrest and search the IS personnel involved in the activities to build up public opinion during the election campaign and reported about the team's future investigation plan.
					
					Hearing this, Jo got very angry and disagreed with him, claiming there is no need to turn the situation favorable to the opposition parties, he disclosed.
					
					He added he got from Jo the instructions four times to rewrite the arraignment against Won Se Hun, former director of the IS, presented to the Court.
					
					Lawmakers from the opposition parties including the Democratic Party of south Korea charged at the inspection that Yun's exclusion from the special inspection revealed Park regime's intention to control the prosecution.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Moves to Revive Era of "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Moves to Revive Era of "Yusin" Dictatorship
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on Oct. 21 carried an editorial titled "Is talk about 'new village movement' fit for present times?"
					Recalling that Park Geun Hye said she would develop the "new village movement" into an all-people movement, the editorial accused her of bringing forward the leftover of the Park Chung-Hee era.
					
					To revive the "new village movement" which supported the "Yusin" dictatorship is an anachronistic act of turning the clock back, it charged.
					
					People cannot but worry about her action of bringing society back to the period of the past dictatorship, it noted.
					
					The flown water cannot operate a water mill, it added.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-DPRK War Drumbeats under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-DPRK War Drumbeats under Fire
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Puppet Defense Minister of south Korea Kim Kwan Jin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Choe Yun Hui recently made much ado about someone's "provocation." They let loose a spate of warlike outbursts calling for "unhesitatingly taking prompt and resolute counteractions" and "blowing up bases of provocations and annihilating supporting and commanding forces."
					Papers Wednesday observe in commentaries in this regard:
					
					These are deliberate moves to escalate the north-south confrontation and tensions to an extreme phase and ignite a nuclear war.
					
					Rodong Sinmun says:  Intolerable are attempts of the warmongers to charge the DPRK with provocation and justify their moves to escalate the confrontation by spreading sheer lies.
					
					The inter-Korean relations are now on the verge of crisis after losing the hard-won opportunity of improvement. The south Korean authorities are wholly to blame for this as they have been keen on provocations against the DPRK, abusing the north-south dialogue for confrontation. If they do not want to see escalating tensions, they should discontinue military provocations against the DPRK, to begin with.
					
					Finding themselves in an extreme ruling crisis, they desperately seek to divert elsewhere the public attention and realize their ambition for invading the DPRK by screwing up the military tensions between the north and the south to an extreme phase. But it is a foolish move to precipitate their self-destruction.
					
					The DPRK has already served warnings to them and offered opportunities enough to understand. If they persist in provocations against the DPRK despite its warnings, it will take strong countermeasures against them.
					
					Minju Joson warns if the south Korean military warmongers intrude into the areas and territorial waters and air of the DPRK even an inch, its revolutionary armed forces will reduce the whole of south Korea to ashes.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Demand Improved Social Status
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Demand Improved Social Status
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the Federation of Public Transport Trade Union under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally in front of Posin Pavilion in Seoul on October 19 to demand the puppet government improve social status and treatment of workers, according to south Korean KBS.
					At the rally speakers denounced the "government" for enforcing a misrule deteriorating the living of the workers including tenders of sick persons and nurses.
					
					They urged it to take measures to improve social status and treatment of the workers, to begin with.

articles.title: Projected Saber-rattling of S. Korean Warmongers under Fire
articles.content:
Projected Saber-rattling of S. Korean Warmongers under Fire
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers announced that they would stage Hoguk exercise for 9 days from Thursday, according to KBS of south Korea.
					They are openly claiming that the exercise is aimed to increase the capability for carrying out joint operations among various army services to cope with "the north's provocation of local war."
					
					It will reportedly involve provocative drills such as those for infiltrating into coastal areas of the north and defending the islands in the northwest waters.
					
					Provocative nature of Hoguk has already been disclosed.
					
					The Yonphyong Island shelling incident that pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war occurred during the Hoguk drill in 2010.
					
					At that time the puppet forces faced a merciless punishment from the Korean People's Army while deliberately firing shells into the inviolable territorial waters of the north during the madcap exercise staged on Yonphyong Island under the pretext of defending the islands in the northwest waters.
					
					The projected saber-rattling of the puppet military will only bring into bolder relief its true colors as the arch criminal increasing the danger of a war.

articles.title: Punishment of Prime Movers of Interference in Election Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Prime Movers of Interference in Election Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council to Denounce IS Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation in south Korea held a rally at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on October 19 demanding the probe into the truth about the interference in the election and punishment of its prime movers.
					At the rally speakers said that more facts are being disclosed one after another to prove that the Intelligence Service (IS) and the army Cyber Command interfered in the election.
					
					They demanded the present chief executive apologize for the election fraud and make sure that a special investigation is conducted to probe the truth about the military's interference in the election.

articles.title: Strong Action against Suppression of Teachers Union Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Strong Action against Suppression of Teachers Union Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea held a press conference on Monday and declared it would fight against the suppression by the puppet authorities, according to south Korean MBC.
					The "government", which threatened that the union will lose its qualifications in case it does not mend its internal rules so as to deprive those discharged of their qualifications as unionists, is pushing forward it by law, the organization said.
					
					It noted that it would form a large-scale defense counsel against the authorities' suppression so as to turn out in legal counteraction and launch actions across south Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a joint statement on October 15 in support of the statement of the spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) and a statement of the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					The statement said:
					
					A grave atmosphere of confrontation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula again due to the recent vicious hostile acts of the U.S. imperialists, chieftain of aggression and war, against the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. came out with brigandish logic that it will opt for dialogue with the DPRK and conclude the non-aggression pact when the latter starts the denuclearization first.
					
					The root cause of the nuclear issue on the peninsula entirely lies in that the U.S. forces present in south Korea deployed nuclear weapons there and posed constant threat of a nuclear war to the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK's access to nukes is a measure for defending the dignity of the country and nation and ensuring peace on the peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					If the U.S. truly hopes for the denuclearization on the peninsula and in the rest of the world and the improvement of the DPRK-U.S. relations,  it should immediately pull its aggression forces and nukes out of south Korea and lift all sanctions against the DPRK without delay and completely roll back its hostile policy towards latter.
					
					The progressive political parties and organizations of Peru fully support the statement of the spokesman for the NDC of the DPRK and the statement of the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry and express solidarity with the Korean people in their just struggle for independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Observed by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Observed by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Russia, Ukraine and a regional body posted special write-ups on their websites to mark the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK posted articles titled "Founder of the WPK" and "Single-minded unity of the WPK" illustrated with photos documenting revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un from October 6 to 11.
					
					It also posted videos showing the single-minded unity of the DPRK and the invincible might of the Korean People's Army, immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung", "No Motherland without You", "Please Receive Our Salute" and other Korean songs.
					
					The Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, Anti-Globalization Movement of Russia, the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea of Ukraine and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted articles titled "WPK is a mother party" and "True picture of the DPRK" in the period between October 6 and 10.
					
					The articles introduced in detail the exploits the peerlessly great men performed by building and leading the WPK, their Songun leadership feats and the WPK's history of victory and glory.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked in Syria
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked in Syria
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Syrian newspapers carried special articles on Oct. 8 and 10 to mark the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					The Syrian paper Al Nour carried articles titled "Workers' Party of Korea" and "New Era of Building Thriving Nation" under the headline "WPK and 68 Years of Struggle". The paper said the WPK founded and led by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, eternal leaders of the Korean people, is the revolutionary party of the working class and the party of working masses, explaining in detail the party's character and duty. 
					
					The paper went on:
					
					The Korean people are led by the great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the idea, leadership, traits and virtues. 
					
					The Korean people will as ever dynamically advance along the road of socialism, holding aloft the red flag of the revolution with firm faith in sure victory, closely united around Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The papers Al Thawrah and Al Baath referred to the history of the WPK which has always won victory after victory without a single mistake or deviation from its line under the wise leadership of the great brilliant commanders of Songun. 
					
					The WPK is now bringing about eye-opening miracles and innovations in building an economic power, invariably holding high the banner of Songun, the papers said, adding:
					
					The Korean people will achieve bigger progress and prosperity in the era of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported by Cuban Figure
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported by Cuban Figure
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Jose Manuel Galego Montano, vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, at a stamp-issuing ceremony held in Havana on October 16 to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK stressed that the founding of the DPRK marked an historical event that proclaimed the birth of an independent and sovereign state, genuine country of the people.
					He said:
					
					The DPRK, the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolutionary armed forces founded by President Kim Il Sung provide a fundamental guarantee for the DPRK to confidently advance along the road of its development.
					
					The Korean people defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, built a socialist power and achieved eye-opening successes in all fields under the leadership of the President.
					
					Kim Il Sung is the real comrade-in-arms and close friend of the Cuban people.
					
					The fraternal relations between the Republic of Cuba and the DPRK were provided by Fidel Castro Ruz and Kim Il Sung.
					
					This friendship is injecting vitality into the Cuban people in their efforts for building socialism.
					
					The peoples of the two countries are struggling against the U.S. imperialists, their common enemy.
					
					We will positively support the Korean people in their struggle for peacefully achieving the country's reunification free from any interference by foreign forces.
					
					I wish Marshal Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the great leaders, success in his work for leading the building of a thriving nation.
					
					I send sincere congratulations to the fraternal party, government and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Israeli Move to Expand Jewish Settlements under Fire
articles.content:
Israeli Move to Expand Jewish Settlements under Fire
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The prospect of peace talks between Palestine and Israel remains dim due to the Israeli authorities' persistent move to expand Jewish settlements.
					Late in July the peace talks resumed after nearly three years of hiatus.
					
					Israel set free the first group of 26 Palestinian prisoners in August as a token of its "sincerity" towards the talks and promised to release the second group by late in October.
					
					Holding out such carrot to Palestine, the Israeli authorities officially announced that Israel would build 800 Jewish settlements in East Kuds and 400 others in the West Bank behind the scene of the talks.
					
					This double-dealing attitude of Israel is nothing but a mockery and deception of the international community.
					
					Greatly enraged by this, Palestine and the international community are bitterly condemning the Israeli authorities for driving the peace talks to catastrophe.
					
					King of Jordan Abdullah Ⅱ denounced the unilateral action of Israel to derail the Mideast peace process, warning that this would bring serious consequences to the regional peace process in the future.
					
					Iranian Senior Cleric Ahmad Khatami said that Palestine-Israel peace talks would never help the oppressed Palestinians.
					
					The foreign minister of Qatar termed Israel's ceaseless building of Jewish settlements as a hurdle lying in the way of making Palestine and Israel reach a peace agreement.
					
					The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Turkey in a statement strongly demanded Israel lift at once such measures as the decision to build settlements.
					
					Peace will never settle in the Mideast region unless Israel quits the territory of Palestine and it is achievable only through a struggle.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. en la Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. en la Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias Estados Unidos vuelve a llevar a la agravacion de tension y enfrentamiento la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana que se hallaba en la fase de distension, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 23 una declaracion.
					El cada dia mas creciente chantaje nuclear y preparativos de guerra de agresion de Estados Unidos son una grave violacion a la soberania y el derecho a la existencia de la RPDC y flagrante infraccion a los acuerdos RPDC-EE.UU. y a la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre en que EE.UU. "confirmo" no emplear todas las fuerzas armadas inclusive las armas nucleares contra la RPDC ni amenazarla con esos pertrechos, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Sin embargo, para encubrir sus crimenes e imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la agravacion de tension, el imperio yanqui induce en error la opinion publica como si la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana fuera la renuncia de las armas nucleares de la RPDC diciendo que si es verdad la reoperacion de las facilidades nucleares de Nyongbyon, lo cual deviene una violacion a los deberes y compromisos internacionales.
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, invariable meta politica del gobierno de la RPDC, no es la parcial renuncia primordial de armas nucleares de esta sino es el proceso de convertir toda la Peninsula Coreana en una region exenta de armas nucleares a base de la eliminacion completa de la sustancial amenaza nuclear a la RPDC proveniente del exterior mediante la accion simultanea.
					
					Tanto en el pasado como en la actualidad, la accion VS la accion es el principio fundamental para la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y nunca habra el que la RPDC actue primera y unilateralmente.
					
					Hoy, en la Peninsula Coreana donde no existen ni paz ni estabilidad ni tampoco dialogo, solo hay la campana de amenaza nuclear y de sancion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Para hacer frente a la creciente amenaza nuclear del exterior, no podemos menos de fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear ni ser restringidos a nada por mas tiempo.
					
					Deseamos la paz y la estabilidad y exigimos el abandono de la politica hostil de EE.UU., pero nunca las mendigamos.
					
					La RPDC avanzara a pasos firmes hacia la victoria definitiva por la senda de la independencia, la de Songun y la del socialismo sin hacer caso a como actue EE.UU.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Peru
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Peru
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Hak Chol fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en la Republica Peruana.

articles.title: Kim Un Guk gana medalla de oro en Campeonato Mundial
articles.content:
Kim Un Guk gana medalla de oro en Campeonato Mundial
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ACNC) -- Se amplian los exitos de jugadores coreanos en el Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas de 2013 que tiene lugar en Polonia.
					En la competencia de la division de 62kg, efectuada el dia 22, el pesista coreano Kim Un Guk conquisto una medalla de oro al levantar 150 kilos en arranque.
					
					Con 170 kilos en envion y un total de 320kg, el ocupo segundo lugar en su peso corporal.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la propaganda de "meritos" de Park Geun-hye hechos en su visita al extranjero
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la propaganda de "meritos" de Park Geun-hye hechos en su visita al extranjero
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ACNC) -- Despues de su gira por los paises de Asia Oriental, usando expresiones como "manejo de cooperacion para la paz" y "establecimiento de dialogo de seguridad", la banda de Park Geun-hye anuncia que "consiguio el apoyo de los paises de Asia Oriental al proceso de confianza de la Peninsula Coreana y el proyecto de paz del Nordeste Asiatico".
					Es una propaganda de "meritos" de los politiqueros tan torpes y estupidos.
					
					?Que es lo que ha hecho la "presidenta" surcoreana por la nacion y la historia durante sus repetidas visitas al extranjero, inclusive la reciente gira?
					
					En una palabra, fueron solo los actos traidores de suplicar a las fuerzas foraneas la cooperacion internacional en su campana de enfrentamiento con la connacional RPDC.
					
					Al recordar su visita a Estados Unidos, la primera al extranjero despues de la toma del poder, ella dijo cosas absurdas, tales como la supuesta "unificacion pacifica en el principio de la economia de mercado libre", y censuro la linea de la RPDC de impulsar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares. Por esta razon, la opinion publica interna y externa critico a ella diciendo que "mostro su afan de enfrentarse con el Norte de Corea en la disyuntiva de la guerra o la paz".
					
					La dependencia de las fuerzas foraneas es el modo de subsistencia de Park heredado de su padre.
					
					Por culpa de los titeres surcoreanos, fue creado en estos dias en la Peninsula Coreana el ambiente conflictivo, al ser eliminada la atmosfera de reconciliacion.
					
					En lugar de pedir disculpas a la nacion, la banda de Park opto por recrudecer la confrontacion fratricida en contubernio de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Al estrechar el cerco de sancion y presion militar contra la RPDC, trata de realizar su siniestra ambicion de agredirla.
					
					Tras definir con su amo norteamericano la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste", guion de ataque nuclear preventivo a la RPDC, desarrollo peligrosos ejercicios maritimos conjuntos introduciendo hasta el portaaviones nuclear de EE.UU. en los Mares Este, Oeste y Sur de Corea.
					
					Si se tiene en cuenta las caracteristicas topograficas de la Peninsula Coreana, no seria dificil cuan peligrosas consecuencias produciran las imprudentes acciones militares de la banda surcoreana.
					
					Es una leccion de la historia que la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras causa la agravacion de desconfianza y confrontacion y obstaculiza el dialogo y la cooperacion entre los connacionales.
					
					A pesar de que puso en peligro la paz y estabilidad de la region, ella habla ridiculamente del "proyecto de paz del Nordeste Asiatico".
					
					La campana de enfrentamiento fratricida de los titeres surcoreanos no dara otro resultado que la verguenza y el arruinamiento politico de ellos mismos.

articles.title: ACNC acusa a Japon de embellecer criminales de guerra
articles.content:
ACNC acusa a Japon de embellecer criminales de guerra
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ACNC) -- El dia 18, mas de 150 parlamentarios japoneses acudieron a donde estan enterradas las tablillas mortuarias de los criminales de guerra de categoria especial so pretexto de gran ceremonia otonal de recordacion.
					Los ultraderechistas encabezados por el mandatario justifican la adoracion embelleciendo a los militaristas antecedentes.
					
					El dia 17 el mandatario japones dedico algo al santuario Yasukuni diciendo que el mismo "respetaba" a los que sacrificaron sus vidas por la patria.
					
					El director del secretariado del gabinete y otros politiqueros ultraderechistas les elogian como "fallecidos en la guerra pensando en la patria y preocupando por las familias".
					
					Esto siendo maniobras militaristas orientadas a encomiar como "heroes" a los fascistas y asesinos y a acelerar la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar y los preparativos de nueva agresion deviene otro crimen especial a ser cuestionado al igual que los delitos cometidos en el pasado por los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					Todos los tipejos estimados por los reaccionarios japoneses fueron los delincuentes especiales nunca perdonables por la conciencia de la humanidad por haber impuesto en el siglo pasado incontables desgracias y penas a los coreanos y los demas pueblos asiaticos.
					
					Los crimenes de los bestiales japoneses, que insatisfechos con el asesinato y saqueo cometieron los archicrimenes inclusive el caso de esclavas sexuales, nunca se borraran aunque transcurran los tiempos y no estan liquidados  todavia.
					
					Los criminales de categoria especial del imperio japones impusieron crimenes imborrables tambien a sus habitantes.
					
					Reclutaron a los adultos y jovenes para la guerra de agresion y los convirtieron en las fieras y su pais en el de diablo.
					
					Hablar del "sacrificio valioso" y "respeto" a esos criminales constituye un desafio frontal a la sociedad  internacional y una burla a los moradores japoneses.
					
					Ultimamente, un muerto criminal nacista en Italia no pudo conseguir la tierra para su enterramiento y otros paises europeos se esfuerzan por erradicar cabalmente el nazismo. La realidad del pais isleno comprueba fehacientemente que este es un pais fascista de version moderna con la fiebre belica y pais de guerra degenerado.
					
					Para convertir a los habitantes japoneses en los fanaticos militaristas y movilizarlos a la reagresion justificando la idea fascista y los actos antieticos de los criminales de guerra, los politiqueros japoneses visitan de continuo el santuario Yasukuni presentando como "patriotas" a los criminales ejecutados sin piedad segun la ley internacional. 
					
					La historia comprobo que les corresponderan solo el infierno a los locos que buscan su salida en la agresion, el saqueo y homicidio. 
					
					Si los reaccionarios japoneses pretenden hasta el fin convertir su pais en potencia militar y recurrir a una nueva agresion a otros paises, Japon sera destruido totalmente.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe conocer bien a la RPDC, aconseja Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe conocer bien a la RPDC, aconseja Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 23 de octubre (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que en estos dias, las autoridades estadounidenses hablan como si tuvieran interes en la mejora de relaciones con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Si es verdad lo que dicen ellas, EE.UU. debe tomar la valiente decision de retirar del territorio surcoreano a sus tropas agresoras, asi insiste el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					No cabe la menor duda que se trata de un embuste la propuesta del tratado de la no agresion presentada por los que realizan sin parar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear con bombarderos estrategicos y portaaviones nuclear y publican abiertamente hasta la estrategia de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					El imperio norteamericano agrava artificialmente la tension desafiando a los esfuerzos pacientes por la paz de la RPDC para impedir que esta portadora de arma nuclear logre la prosperidad economica y para justificar el aumento de sus fuerzas armadas que persigue la hegemonia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					He aqui el motivo por el cual EE.UU. se dedica a la provocacion militar negando obstinadamente la justa demanda de la RPDC de asegurar la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana a traves del dialogo y negociaciones incondicionales.
					
					La actitud de EE.UU., que se propone firmar el tratado de la no agresion despues de desarmar a la contraparte, es el climax de su cinismo y astucia.
					
					En sus vivencias, el pueblo coreano conocio en carne propia que la propuesta norteamericana no puede defender la paz ni la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, pero las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias autodefensivas, dispuestas de artefactos nucleares, defienden y garantizan lo todo.
					
					Si EE.UU. desea de veras la mejora de relaciones con la RPDC, debe conocer bien a su contraparte y asumir una posicion correcta.
